title: Grilled Chicken Salad
instructions: Grill the chicken breast until fully cooked, about 6-8 minutes per side.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens and cherry tomatoes.
Slice the grilled chicken and add it to the salad.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar over the salad.
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Vegan Pasta
instructions: Cook the pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, heat olive oil and saut√© minced garlic until fragrant.
Add cherry tomatoes and spinach to the pan and cook until softened.
Drain the pasta and add it to the pan with the vegetables.
Season with salt and pepper, then toss to combine.

title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the slices of bread until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and mix in lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture evenly on the toasted bread.
Sprinkle with red pepper flakes if desired, and serve immediately.
